months <- c("2010-10-17","2010-10-18","2010-10-19","2010-10-20")
revenue <- c(10000,11000,10500,9500)

results <- data.frame(months,revenue)

forecast(results$revenue)

> print(results)
       months revenue
1  2010-10-17   10000
2  2010-10-18   11000
3  2010-10-19   10500
4  2010-10-20    9500
5  2010-10-21   10250
6  2010-10-22   10250
7  2010-10-23   10250
8  2010-10-24   10250
9  2010-10-25   10250
10 2010-10-26   10250
11 2010-10-27   10250
12 2010-10-28   10250
13 2010-10-29   10250
14 2010-10-30   10250
15 2010-10-31   10250
